mapper.sql: SNO, NAME, OPENINGPRICE, CLOSINGPRICE, CURRENTPRICE, HIGHESTPRICE, LOWESTPRICE, COMPETITIVEBUYPRICE, COMPETITIVESALEPRICE, NUMBEROFHELD, NUMBEROFTRADED, AMOUNTOFBUY, PRICEOFBUY1, PRICEOFBUY2, PRICEOFBUY3, PRICEOFBUY4, PRICEOFBUY5, AMOUNTOFSALE, PRICEOFSALE1, PRICEOFSALE2, PRICEOFSALE3, PRICEOFSALE4, PRICEOFSALE5, DATE, TIME, ID, SETTLEMENTPRICE, LASTSETTLEMENTPRICE, MARKET, CATEGORY
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PRODUCT_QUOTE
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT_QUOTE (SNO, NAME, OPENINGPRICE, CLOSINGPRICE, CURRENTPRICE, HIGHESTPRICE, LOWESTPRICE, COMPETITIVEBUYPRICE, COMPETITIVESALEPRICE, NUMBEROFHELD, NUMBEROFTRADED, AMOUNTOFBUY, PRICEOFBUY1, PRICEOFBUY2, PRICEOFBUY3, PRICEOFBUY4, PRICEOFBUY5, AMOUNTOFSALE, PRICEOFSALE1, PRICEOFSALE2, PRICEOFSALE3, PRICEOFSALE4, PRICEOFSALE5, DATE, TIME, ID, SETTLEMENTPRICE, LASTSETTLEMENTPRICE, MARKET, CATEGORY ) values (#{sno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openingprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{closingprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{currentprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{highestprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lowestprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{competitivebuyprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{competitivesaleprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{numberofheld,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{numberoftraded,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{amountofbuy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{priceofbuy1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{priceofbuy2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{priceofbuy3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{priceofbuy4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{priceofbuy5,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{amountofsale,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{priceofsale1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{priceofsale2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{priceofsale3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{priceofsale4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{priceofsale5,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{time,jdbcType=TIME}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlementprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lastsettlementprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{market,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update PRODUCT_QUOTE
SNO = #{record.sno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPENINGPRICE = #{record.openingprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CLOSINGPRICE = #{record.closingprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
